DOC.brief_summary: We assess effect alter inspire gas 6MWT distance COPD . We hypothesize HeO2 would improve walk distance reduce shortness breath compare RA O2 , potentially improve quality life COPD patient .
DOC.detailed_description: We hypothesize inspire helium-hyperoxia ( HeO2 ) would significantly improve 6-minute walk test ( 6MWT ) distance Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) subject . This blind , randomize crossover study . At Visit 1 assess pulmonary function , exercise capacity 6MWT distance . Visits 2 3 consist four 6MWT different inspire gas : room air mask ( RA ) , 100 % O2 mask ( Mask O2 ) , 100 % O2 nasal prong ( Nasal O2 ) , 70 % He/30 % O2 mask ( HeO2 ) . Walking distance , shortness breath , leg fatigue , O2 saturation heart rate ( HR ) assess
DOC.criteria: Exertional dyspnea Activity limitation COPD Recent exacerbation ( < 4 wks ) Supplemental O2 Significant cardiovascular/musculoskeletal abnormality
